lead_paragraph: Zabivaka the wolf followed in the footsteps of Naranjito the orange, Footix the football-playing rooster and Fuleco the armadillo by being named as the official mascot of the 2018 World Cup on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Fun-Loving Wolf Named as World Cup Mascot
headline.main: Fun-Loving Wolf Named as World Cup Mascot

snippet: Zabivaka the wolf followed in the footsteps of Naranjito the orange, Footix the football-playing rooster and Fuleco the armadillo by being named as the official mascot of the 2018 World Cup on Saturday....
